## AST.linearizedAST() method

Returns linearized/flat version of given AST as an array of [zipper locations](./zipper.location.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
linearizedAST(tree: ASTNode<OP, T>): Location<ASTNode<OP, T>>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tree | <code>ASTNode&lt;OP, T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Location<ASTNode<OP, T>>[]`
